HERO_DESCRIPTION: Fill out the form below to get an estimate. The estimate will reload as each value changes. Inputs are saved so you can return later!
LABEL_MONTHLY_TRAFFIC: Expected Monthly Traffic to Comment Widget
LABEL_DOMAINS_HELP: Include development sites other than localhost.
LABEL_ADMINISTRATORS_HELP: Some example use cases for admins are managing billing, account data, and developer access.
LABEL_DEBRANDING_HELP: On some plans we show our logo at the bottom of the comment widget. Not all plans support de-branding.
LABEL_MANAGED_TENANTS_HELP: For example, if you want to manage other accounts under your account, or if you want to have a separate sub-account for each site/ environment. We call these tenants.
LABEL_SSO_USERS_HELP: SSO, aka Single-Sign-On, is for easy authentication for your users. If you don't know what this is, enter 0.
LABEL_API_CREDITS_HELP: For most cases, 1 Credit = 1 API Call. If you don't plan on using our API this doesn't apply to you.
CARD_DESCRIPTION_FLEX: Only pay for what you use.
MESSAGE_EXCEEDS_LIMITS: This plan doesn't support your requirements
